script: Ever tried to guess the next word in a sentence? That’s what N-gram language models do! They predict words based on the ones that came before—like how ‘I love’ often leads to ‘you’ or ‘ice cream.’ The ‘N’ tells us how many words they look back at. These models use math to assign probabilities, helping computers understand and generate text. Why does this matter? From autocorrect to chatbots, N-grams make tech smarter by predicting what you might say next. Pretty cool, right?
